meaningMnemonic: Remember how 遮断 means "isolation?" Well the <kanji>machine</kanji> that isolates you from a train is a <vocabulary>crossing gate</vocabulary>. That way you won't walk, bike, or drive your car into an oncoming train.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
